meanings.definition: A muscle at the back of the upper arm.
meanings.sent1: She felt a twinge in her triceps after lifting the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: His triceps bulged as he flexed his arm.
meanings.sent3: The triceps in his arm decided to take a break from all the heavy lifting.
meanings.sent4: Her triceps were like sturdy ropes supporting her arm.
meanings.sent5: The triceps, a powerful muscle, helped him throw the ball far.

meanings.sent1: After working out, she could feel her triceps getting stronger.
meanings.sent2: He focused on toning his triceps at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The triceps muscle in his arm seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her triceps muscle was a symbol of her dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The triceps muscle, like a coiled spring, propelled the weight upwards.
